title: Breaking Down the Season Premiere of ‘Watchmen’ | The Watch
description:
Damon Lindelof’s newest show, ‘Watchmen,’ started off with a bang and we feel like we’re in good hands (0:43). We take a deeper look at the texts the show seems to be drawing from (17:34) and the importance of the musical ‘Oklahoma!’ in the first episode (41:14).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guests: Andy Greenwald and Juliet Litman

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
